p: Since both CARS and TPF have inherent 3D imaging capabilities [ 44], we aim to visualise the essential oil distribution and structural differences of high-THCA and high-CBDA containing trichomes. Therefore, the intensity of the C-H stretching band at 2907 cm − 1 of drug- and fibre-type samples in different z planes was measured and subsequently merged to a 3D image. Simultaneously registered EPI-signals deliver further structural information by TPF of organic substances (em 380–560 nm) and of chlorophyll a (em 560–750 nm).
